about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Home Reserve Rentals is the leading apartment rental company in Moscow
about.paragraph1: Home Reserve Rentals is a leading apartment rental company in Moscow. We offer a wide selection of comfortable accommodation for short-term and long-term rentals.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to provide our guests with quality and safe housing where they will feel at home. We carefully check every apartment and work only with reliable hosts.
about.paragraph3: Over the years, we have earned the trust of thousands of clients and received many awards from leading booking platforms.
about.award2Description: Recognition of the best hosts on the platform

contacts.subtitle: Contact us in a convenient way
contacts.formDescription: Call us or email us, and we will be happy to answer all your questions!
